overview:
Olivier Chatard is a conceptually-driven designer with a passion for photography, type, and symbolism. one very important aspect of his design work is catching not only the people visually but to make them feel. His motive in my work is to create simple and communicative design solutions. He loves challenges and being able to explore all the diverse aspect of design is a thrill.

Olivier worked as a Visual Designer for Yahoo! Entertainment working closely with creative director on different properties Yahoo! Movies, Yahoo! Tv. He also Worked for MTV Networks, Picture Mill, DECA.tv, etc…

Olivier Chatard has also developped a new company focusing on creating conceptual short films. Kinopravdaprod.com

Olivier Chatard is actually the CEO/ Creative director of a new Design Studio Located in Culver City, CA which is offering High Quality Visual, Web, Graphics Design services.

www.olivierchatard.com

SPECIALITIES: Creative/Art Direction, UI Design, UED, Web Design, Print Design, Branding and Identity, Interactive Design.

PRINT DESIGN: book design to ad campaigns. Logo design + concept, pre and post production.

WEB DESIGN: Flash + ActionScript. Webdesign for movie production companies, organization, restaurant, artist, retail stores, photograph, etc…

www.h2oislife.org won 1st grand prize 2007 of “The SIMS in the Hands of Artists” Design MACHINIMA Competition from ELECTRONICS ARTS
